704654f-c.title: Brooklyn: Golden City Park.
704654f-c.text:
(1)
Golden City Park, south of Schenck Ave and west of Rockaway Ave., showing an amsement park. The trolley in this view is on Rockaway
Ave.
July 27, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same from another angle.
July 27, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, showing a ferris wheel.
July 6, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

704653f-a.title: Brooklyn: Garden City Amusement Park (Canarsie Beach).
704653f-a.text:
Golden City Amusement Park, Canarsie Beach, showing minature railroad, in front of the carousel house; sources of delightful entertainment for
children.
July 30, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
704653f-a.folder: Garden City Amusement Park (Canarsie Beach)., Brooklyn, NY
